DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate 1-hour rule-in/rule-out algorithm high-sensitivity cardiac troponin T ( hs-cTnT ) safe effective patient low pretest probability acute myocardial infarction ( MI ) . During study troponins collect 0- , 1- 4/6-hours , absolute change value decide whether patient need hospitalization . Can time interval second troponin test reduce use 1-hour high-sensitivity assay ?
DOC.brief_title: One-hour Troponin Low-prevalence Population Acute Coronary Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Many patient seek Oslo Accident Emergency Outpatient Clinic ( OAEOC ) chest pain . The majority patient symptom suggestive benign non-cardiac chest pain . These patient need directly transfer hospital , admit Observation Unit OAEOC pre-hospital testing , include serial troponins safe rule-out acute MI . The main goal study change current routine Observation Unit OAEOC introduce 1-hour algorithm hs-cTnT faster rule-in/rule-out acute MI . All recruit patient serial troponins test 0 , 1- 4/6 hour , main hypothesis absolute change within 1 hour use surrogate change conclusion draw 4/6 hour . The cutoff level use within 0/1-hour algorithm assay specific specified 2015 European Society Cardiology Guidelines management acute NSTEMI .
DOC.criteria: Patients outpatient clinic suspect noncardiac chest pain/symptoms need test safe ruleout acute MI Written inform consent Acute STEMI ( STelevation myocardial infarction ) ( directly hospital ) Strong suspicion acute NSTEMI/unstable angina ( directly hospital ) Terminal kidney disease glomerular filtration rate ( GFR ) < 20 Unable communicate Norwegian , Swedish , Danish English language
